    • Method Detail

      • getData

        public int getData(double longitude,
                   double latitude)
        Get SRTM elevation for geographic coordinate (WGS-84) Stores a cache of uncompressed SRTM data files at the default directory. It need a Internet connection to fetch SRTM files if they are not in the disk
        Returns:
        Above Sea Level (ASL) altitude in meters

      • setListner

        public void setListner(Srtm.OnProgressListner listner)
        If a file needs to be download this listener will be called periodically
